other_tests.findings: Rapid rate at 130, likely afib, normal axis.
Large bilateral pleural effusions slightly increased, distended appendix with periappendiceal stranding and inflammation, and minimal small bowel obstruction with passage of contrast into the colon.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Since the previous examination, the degree of distention of the proximal small bowel has decreased somewhat, and a couple of very small adjacent organized fluid collections are seen, the largest minimally decreased from the previous examination.

other_tests.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA.
